item.title: 纽约州官员说，在纽约州北部一户非法饲养鳄鱼的人家中，缴获了一条患病的11英尺长的鳄鱼。
item.description:

item.title: "今天我的心碎了...我简直不敢相信"。名模兼演员卡拉-迪瓦伊（Cara Delevingne）在加利福尼亚州工作室城的家被烧毁后悲痛欲绝。目前，火灾原因正在调查中。
item.description:
"My heart is broken today... I cannot believe it." Model and actress Cara Delevingne is devastated after her Studio City, California, home burned down. The cause of the fire is currently under investigation. https://t.co/YzcK94lbyj pic.twitter.com/MUaa6mWEGn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，俄罗斯各地的选民在选举的第二天进行了投票，选举将正式确定弗拉基米尔-普京总统再掌权六年。
item.description:
Voters across Russia cast ballots Saturday on the second day of an election set to formalize six more years of power for President Vladimir Putin, who faces no serious challengers after crushing political dissent over his nearly quarter-century of rule. https://t.co/zwgqiIJvZE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 据他的业务经理证实，他是一位登山家、作家和电影制片人，曾在 1998 年联合执导和制作了一部关于攀登珠穆朗玛峰的 IMAX 纪录片。享年 68 岁。
item.description:
A mountaineer, author and filmmaker who co-directed and co-produced a 1998 IMAX documentary about climbing Mount Everest has died, his business manager confirmed. He was 68. https://t.co/eqknAaswMo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 在奈克斯-本尼迪克特去世后，@ABC 新闻采访了他以前的学生和当地的家长，他们表示，反 LGBTQ 政策和言论的影响在俄克拉荷马州的学校中日益受到关注，比如本尼迪克特曾经就读的奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）。
item.description:
After Nex Benedict's death, @ABC News spoke with former students and local parents, who say that the impact of anti-LGBTQ policy and rhetoric is a growing concern in Oklahoma schools like Owasso High School, where Benedict was a student. https://t.co/jdeUsw2M67

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 作为濒危物种繁育计划的一部分，英国一家动物园迎来了一头南方白犀牛的诞生，动物园称这头小犀牛是 "巨大的喜悦"。

item.title: 研究人员确认了据信是世界上已知最古老的口红--一个装有深红色膏状物的华丽小石瓶。这件罕见的文物是在伊朗东南部发现的。
item.description:
Researchers have identified what is believed to be the world's oldest known lipstick – a small, ornate stone vial containing a deep red paste.

The rare artifact was discovered in southeastern Iran. https://t.co/jUCl08WVQC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 在俄乌战争持续不断的情况下，纽约市的这家乌克兰餐厅成为了希望的灯塔。Veselka 为乌克兰筹集了 50 多万美元，这部新的纪录片记录了它取得的巨大成就。更多信息
item.description:
This Ukrainian restaurant in New York City has become a beacon of hope amid the ongoing Russia-Ukraine war. Veselka raised over half a million dollars for Ukraine, and its monumental achievement is captured in a new documentary.

Read more: https://t.co/j9Ip2u0rrh pic.twitter.com/a7TvrD4FIS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 根据一份新的联邦报告，2023 年仍有 MIS-C 病例发生，而未接种疫苗或接种疫苗后免疫力下降的儿童患这种疾病的风险最高。
item.description:

item.title: 在这一天：30 年前，花样滑冰运动员冬妮娅-哈丁（Tonya Harding）在俄勒冈州波特兰市认罪，承认因掩盖攻击竞争对手南希-凯瑞根（Nancy Kerrigan）的事实而共谋妨碍起诉，避免了牢狱之灾，但被处以 10 万美元的罚款。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: 30 years ago, figure skater Tonya Harding pleaded guilty in Portland, Oregon, to conspiracy to hinder prosecution for covering up an attack on rival Nancy Kerrigan, avoiding jail but drawing a $100,000 fine. https://t.co/TatknUZmZ9 pic.twitter.com/bngghEXc1S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 帕蒂-博伊德是摇摆 60 年代的中心人物。现在，她在佳士得拍卖行出售的大量信件、照片和其他物品让她成为焦点。
